full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTOR MA BZO TSUL GYI RNAM GZHAG 'DOD DON KUN 'GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,GTOR MA BZO TSUL GYI RNAM GZHAG 'DOD DON KUN 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DKAR PO RI YI LHA KHANG GI 'DUS SDER PHYAG LEN DU BYA BA'I PHYIR ^DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS BSGRIGS PA'I TSE YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG BSAM GRUB NYI MA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, SKYE DGU MTHA' DAG BDE SKYID KYI DPAL PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG LDAN PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
